summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Sturgis Road, from Charles Street to Atlantic Street; and Atlantic Street, from Sturgis Road to Rainier Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden cross walks, together with all necessary catch basins and other appurtenances necessary for surface drainage, in accordance with Resolution No. 712 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
